example.parse: (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS تبرعت) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_NOM تلميذات) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الثانوية))) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN مبلغ)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المال)))) (SBAR (-NONE- *ICH*-2)))) (PP-DTV (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN انتفاضة) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP الاقصى))))
